Enums/SensibillError.html#/apiInternalSe.name: apiInternalServerError
Enums/SensibillError.html#/apiInternalSe.abstract: -500 - Internal server error. Please contact Sensibill team if encountered.

Enums/SensibillError.html#/unknownError.name: unknownError
Enums/SensibillError.html#/unknownError.abstract: 1 - SDK was not able to recognize the error.

Enums/SensibillError.html#/apiUnknownSta.name: apiUnknownStatusCode
Enums/SensibillError.html#/apiUnknownSta.abstract: 2 - Status code of HTTP response could not be interpreted as success or failure and no error was returned.

Enums/SensibillError.html#/fdnNSURLUnkno.name: fdnNSURLUnknownError
Enums/SensibillError.html#/fdnNSURLUnkno.abstract: 3 - A general error with domain NSURLError.

Enums/SensibillError.html#/apiNoAccess.name: apiNoAccess
Enums/SensibillError.html#/apiNoAccess.abstract: 1000 - Not entitled to access an object (user, receipt, merchant or client) based on current access token

Enums/SensibillError.html#/apiNoAuthPass.name: apiNoAuthPasswordTemporary
Enums/SensibillError.html#/apiNoAuthPass.abstract: 1003 - The password is temporary, and will be authorized when reset by the user

Enums/SensibillError.html#/apiMissingCre.name: apiMissingCredentials
Enums/SensibillError.html#/apiMissingCre.abstract: 1012 - Missing parameter in authentication request (email/password, or accessID/accessSecret/credentialType)

Enums/SensibillError.html#/fdnNSURLAuthe.name: fdnNSURLAuthenticationError
Enums/SensibillError.html#/fdnNSURLAuthe.abstract: 1013 - Authentication error, e.g. authentication required, or cancelled by a client

Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkParseToken.name: sdkParseTokenFailure
Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkParseToken.abstract: 1022 - Received response could not be parsed as token

Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkAuthentica.name: sdkAuthenticationFailureAfterTokenRefresh
Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkAuthentica.abstract: 1024 - Request failed with error 401, even after token was successfully refreshed. May indicate that token provider returns invalid token.

Enums/SensibillError.html#/apiBadRequest.name: apiBadRequest
Enums/SensibillError.html#/apiBadRequest.abstract: 1030 - Request omitted a required parameter, or invalid value was provided for a required parameter.

Enums/SensibillError.html#/apiInvalidPar.name: apiInvalidParameters
Enums/SensibillError.html#/apiInvalidPar.abstract: 1031 - One or more invalid parameters were passed in the request

Enums/SensibillError.html#/apiMissingPar.name: apiMissingParameters
Enums/SensibillError.html#/apiMissingPar.abstract: 1032 - One or more parameters were missing in the request

Enums/SensibillError.html#/apiParameterN.name: apiParameterNotAllowed
Enums/SensibillError.html#/apiParameterN.abstract: 1033 - Extra parameter in request, or attempt to modify read-only parameter

Enums/SensibillError.html#/apiValidation.name: apiValidationFailed
Enums/SensibillError.html#/apiValidation.abstract: 1035 - Validation failed on added/modified entiity. Check parameter values (e.g. incorrectly formatted dates)

Enums/SensibillError.html#/apiRequestCon.name: apiRequestConflict
Enums/SensibillError.html#/apiRequestCon.abstract: 1037 - Conflicting values provided. For example if there is already an email account with the provided email address

Enums/SensibillError.html#/fdnNSURLRespo.name: fdnNSURLResponseError
Enums/SensibillError.html#/fdnNSURLRespo.abstract: 1040 - Response was not returned or could not be understood

Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkParseUserM.name: sdkParseUserModelFailure
Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkParseUserM.abstract: 1041 - Response could not be parsed as UserAPIModel

Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkParsePwdSt.name: sdkParsePwdStrengthFailure
Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkParsePwdSt.abstract: 1042 - Response could not be parsed as PasswordEvaluation

Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkParseCheck.name: sdkParseCheckExistenceModelFailure
Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkParseCheck.abstract: 1043 - Response could not be parsed as CheckExistenceAPIModel

Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkParseCurre.name: sdkParseCurrenciesModelFailure
Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkParseCurre.abstract: 1044 - Response could not be parsed as SupportedCurrenciesAPIModel

Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkParseRecei.name: sdkParseReceiptModelFailure
Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkParseRecei.abstract: 1045 - Response could not be parsed as ReceiptAPIModel

Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkParseTagsM.name: sdkParseTagsModelFailure
Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkParseTagsM.abstract: 1046 - Response could not be parsed as ReceiptAPIModel

Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkInvalidCon.name: sdkInvalidConfiguration
Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkInvalidCon.abstract: 1050 - Configuration provided in Sensibill.plist is invalid. Verify log for more information

Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkMissingCon.name: sdkMissingConfigurationFile
Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkMissingCon.abstract: 1051 - Sensibill.plist file was not found. Verify log for more information

Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkConfigurat.name: sdkConfigurationFileParsingFailed
Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkConfigurat.abstract: 1052 - The contents of Sensibill.plist could not be read or parsed.

Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkMissingCon.name: sdkMissingConfigurationValues
Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkMissingCon.abstract: 1053 - SDK configuration is missing one or more values

Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkMissingCer.name: sdkMissingCertificateFilesForPinning
Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkMissingCer.abstract: 1054 - Some of the certificate files, specified in Sensibill.plist were not found

Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkMissingCre.name: sdkMissingCredentialType
Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkMissingCre.abstract: 1055 - SDK configuration is missing Credential Type

Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkMissingCac.name: sdkMissingCacheIdentifier
Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkMissingCac.abstract: 1056 - Current context is missing cache identifier

Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkFolderRefr.name: sdkFolderRefreshFailure
Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkFolderRefr.abstract: 1057 - SDK failed to refresh folder collection for current user

Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkMissingUse.name: sdkMissingUserInContext
Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkMissingUse.abstract: 1058 - User is missing in current context

Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkMissingTok.name: sdkMissingTokenProvider
Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkMissingTok.abstract: 1059 - TokenProvider object of SDK instance is not set

Enums/SensibillError.html#/fdnNSURLCanno.name: fdnNSURLCannotConnectToServer
Enums/SensibillError.html#/fdnNSURLCanno.abstract: 1062 - Cannot connect to server (e.g. DNS resolution, or routing issue)

Enums/SensibillError.html#/fdnNSURLNetwo.name: fdnNSURLNetworkConnectionError
Enums/SensibillError.html#/fdnNSURLNetwo.abstract: 1063 - Network connection error (e.g. not connected to internet)

Enums/SensibillError.html#/fdnNSURLWrong.name: fdnNSURLWrongUrl
Enums/SensibillError.html#/fdnNSURLWrong.abstract: 1065 - Application is trying to access a wrong URL

Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkCannotStar.name: sdkCannotStart
Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkCannotStar.abstract: 1080 - Start cannot be called at this time. SDK is already starting, running, or stopping. Wait for completion or call stop to interrupt and restart.

Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkStartWasIn.name: sdkStartWasInterrupted
Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkStartWasIn.abstract: 1081 - Start of SDK was interrupted by a user-initiated stop

Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkIsAlreadyS.name: sdkIsAlreadyStopping
Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkIsAlreadyS.abstract: 1082 - SDK is already stopping. Wait for completion.

Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkNotStarted.name: sdkNotStarted
Enums/SensibillError.html#/sdkNotStarted.abstract: 1083 - SDK must be started to perform a requested operation.

Classes/SBAnalytics.html#/c:objc(cs)SBAn.abstract: Notify attached SBEventsListener of SBTrackingEvent matching the provided event name

Classes/SBAnalytics.html#/c:objc(cs)SBAn.abstract: Notify attached SBEventsListener of screen change SBTrackingEvent based on screen name provided

Classes/SBAnalytics.html#/c:objc(cs)SBAn.abstract: Add SBEventListener to be notified when a SBTrackingEvent is triggered

Classes/SBReceipt.html#/c:objc(cs)SBRece.name: listingSortDate
Classes/SBReceipt.html#/c:objc(cs)SBRece.abstract: The date used when sorting receipts. Is set to SBReceipt.date, if available. Otherwise, is set to a date when receipt was uploaded.

Classes/SBReceipt.html#/c:objc(cs)SBRece.name: arrivalTime
Classes/SBReceipt.html#/c:objc(cs)SBRece.abstract: The date on which receipt was uploaded

Classes/SBReceipt.html#/c:objc(cs)SBRece.name: isValidationRequired
Classes/SBReceipt.html#/c:objc(cs)SBRece.abstract: True if receipt is pending validation (some required fields are missing)

Classes/SBReceipt.html#/c:objc(cs)SBRece.name: tipAmount
Classes/SBReceipt.html#/c:objc(cs)SBRece.abstract: The amount to show as the tip (gratuity)

Classes/SBReceipt.html#/c:objc(cs)SBRece.name: subTotalAmount
Classes/SBReceipt.html#/c:objc(cs)SBRece.abstract: The amount to show as the subtotal

Classes/SBReceipt.html#/c:objc(cs)SBRece.name: taxAmount
Classes/SBReceipt.html#/c:objc(cs)SBRece.abstract: The amount to show as the sum of all taxes

Classes/SBReceipt.html#/c:objc(cs)SBRece.name: privateMetaData
Classes/SBReceipt.html#/c:objc(cs)SBRece.abstract: Allows to specify receipt’s external account transaction id

Classes/SBReceipt.html#/c:objc(cs)SBRece.name: +defaultAmountValue
Classes/SBReceipt.html#/c:objc(cs)SBRece.abstract: Default total amount set when no value is returned from the server

Classes/SBExternalAccountTransaction.htm.name: postedDate
Classes/SBExternalAccountTransaction.htm.abstract: Optional - Date that transaction had finished processing and was posted for client to see

Classes/SBExternalAccountTransaction.htm.name: maskedAccountNumber
Classes/SBExternalAccountTransaction.htm.abstract: Optional - Masked number of account used to make transaction. (Most likely a 12 digit number. e.g. ************6789)

Classes/SBExternalAccountTransaction.htm.name: receiptID
Classes/SBExternalAccountTransaction.htm.abstract: Unique identifier of Sensibill SBReceipt, if receipt was matched to transaction.

Classes/SBExternalAccountTransaction.htm.name: -isEqualToExternalAccountTransaction:
Classes/SBExternalAccountTransaction.htm.abstract: Function to determine if this external account transaction is the same as another

Enums/MatchingError.html#/unknownError.name: unknownError
Enums/MatchingError.html#/unknownError.abstract: Could not match for an unknown reason

Enums/MatchingError.html.name: MatchingError
Enums/MatchingError.html.abstract: Error codes that can be occur when matching transactions to receipts

Classes/SBExternalAccountTransaction.htm.name: SBExternalAccountTransaction
Classes/SBExternalAccountTransaction.htm.abstract: Protocol outlining all the properties of an external account transaction

Classes/SBPrivateMetaData.html.name: SBPrivateMetaData
Classes/SBPrivateMetaData.html.abstract: Allows to specify receipt’s external account transaction id

Protocols/TransactionObserver.html#/stat.name: statusDidChangeForTransaction(_:)
Protocols/TransactionObserver.html#/stat.abstract: Informs that given transaction’s status (reflected in status property) has changed.

Protocols/TransactionObserver.html#/expe.name: expectedProcessingTimeDidChangeForTransaction(_:)
Protocols/TransactionObserver.html#/expe.abstract: Informs that given transaction’s processing time (reflected in expectedProcessingTime property) has changed.

Enums/TransactionType.html#/email.name: email
Enums/TransactionType.html#/email.abstract: Transaction information for receipt retrieved from the email

Enums/TransactionType.html#/nonReceiptEm.name: nonReceiptEmail
Enums/TransactionType.html#/nonReceiptEm.abstract: Transaction information for receipts converted from non-receipt emails

Enums/TransactionStatus.html#/unknown.name: unknown
Enums/TransactionStatus.html#/unknown.abstract: Transaction status is not yet known. Upon local transaction validation this status can change to uploading or failed.

Enums/TransactionStatus.html#/uploading.name: uploading
Enums/TransactionStatus.html#/uploading.abstract: Transaction processing started. This status is set immediately after transaction was locally validated. This status will be kept until a response from server is received and can be followed by processing, completed, or failed status.

Enums/TransactionStatus.html#/processing.name: processing
Enums/TransactionStatus.html#/processing.abstract: Transaction is being processed by the server. This value is set after transaction was accepted by the server for processing, and can be followed by completed, or failed status.

Enums/TransactionStatus.html#/completed.name: completed
Enums/TransactionStatus.html#/completed.abstract: Transaction processing had finished successfully. This is a final status.

Enums/TransactionStatus.html#/failed.name: failed
Enums/TransactionStatus.html#/failed.abstract: Transaction validation or processing had failed. This is a final status.

Enums/TransactionError.html#/transaction.name: transactionTypeIsMissing
Enums/TransactionError.html#/transaction.abstract: Transaction is invalid: type was not set

Enums/TransactionError.html#/transaction.name: transactionHasNoValidProcessor
Enums/TransactionError.html#/transaction.abstract: Transaction is invalid: not finished, but cannot be uploaded, monitored, or updated

Enums/TransactionError.html#/uploadCance.name: uploadCancelledNoImage
Enums/TransactionError.html#/uploadCance.abstract: Transaction state is invalid for upload: imageData is not set

Enums/TransactionError.html#/pollMissing.name: pollMissingRemoteId
Enums/TransactionError.html#/pollMissing.abstract: Transaction state is invalid for polling: remoteId is not set

Enums/TransactionError.html#/conversionM.name: conversionMissingEmailId
Enums/TransactionError.html#/conversionM.abstract: Transaction state is invalid for conversion: emailId is not set

Enums/TransactionError.html#/uploadFaile.name: uploadFailedTooManyTimes
Enums/TransactionError.html#/uploadFaile.abstract: Retry: upload request failed too many times

Enums/TransactionError.html#/pollFailedT.name: pollFailedTooManyTimes
Enums/TransactionError.html#/pollFailedT.abstract: Retry: poll for transaction updates failed too many times

Enums/TransactionError.html#/updateFaile.name: updateFailedTooManyTimes
Enums/TransactionError.html#/updateFaile.abstract: Retry: update receipt failed too many times

Enums/TransactionError.html#/conversionF.name: conversionFailedTooManyTimes
Enums/TransactionError.html#/conversionF.abstract: Retry: receipt conversion failed too many times

Enums/TransactionError.html#/uploadCance.name: uploadCancelledImageTooBig
Enums/TransactionError.html#/uploadCance.abstract: Transaction state is invalid for upload: imageData is too big. Reduce image size to 2 MB or less.

Enums/TransactionError.html#/uploadInval.name: uploadInvalidResponse
Enums/TransactionError.html#/uploadInval.abstract: On upload request, server returned a response, that could not be interpreted, and is considered invalid

Enums/TransactionError.html#/pollInvalid.name: pollInvalidResponse
Enums/TransactionError.html#/pollInvalid.abstract: On wait request, server returned a response, that could not be interpreted, and is considered invalid

Enums/ReceiptExpenseType.html#/code.name: code
Enums/ReceiptExpenseType.html#/code.abstract: String representation of expense type. When unknown it returns nil.

Classes/SBDataEvent.html#/c:objc(cs)SBDa.name: -addReceiptObserver:withBlock:
Classes/SBDataEvent.html#/c:objc(cs)SBDa.abstract: Add SBDataEventReceiptBlock to monitor receipt data changes in Sensibill Receipt SDK

Classes/SBDataEvent.html#/c:objc(cs)SBDa.name: -addTransactionObserver:withBlock:
Classes/SBDataEvent.html#/c:objc(cs)SBDa.abstract: Add SBDataEventTransactionBlock to monitor transaction data changes in Sensibill Receipt SDK

Classes/TransactionHandler.html#/hasTran.name: hasTransactions
Classes/TransactionHandler.html#/hasTran.abstract: Returns true if there are any transactions at all

Classes/TransactionHandler.html#/convert.name: convert(nonReceiptEmail:didSucceed:)
Classes/TransactionHandler.html#/convert.abstract: Submit email for processing as receipt. Used when automated conversion on server failed, but user would still like to convert an email to receipt

Classes/SBLTransaction.html#/localID.name: localID
Classes/SBLTransaction.html#/localID.abstract: Identifies transaction uniquely on device. Local transaction identifier is generated when instance is created, and does not change.

Classes/SBLTransaction.html#/userID.name: userID
Classes/SBLTransaction.html#/userID.abstract: Identifier of user tied to receipt upload transaction

Classes/SBLTransaction.html#/remoteID.name: remoteID
Classes/SBLTransaction.html#/remoteID.abstract: Identifier of transaction on the server. When remoteID is received, status of transaction is set to processing

Classes/SBLTransaction.html#/expectedPro.name: expectedProcessingTime
Classes/SBLTransaction.html#/expectedPro.abstract: Transaction processing time estimated by the server (fast, medium, or slow)

Classes/SBLTransaction.html#/receiptID.name: receiptID
Classes/SBLTransaction.html#/receiptID.abstract: Identifier of receipt tied to transaction. Only present when transaction is completed (status is set to .completed)

Classes/SBLTransaction.html#/emailID.name: emailID
Classes/SBLTransaction.html#/emailID.abstract: Source email address of an email that is being converted to a receipt. If this property is set, the type is set to .email

Classes/SBLTransaction.html#/imageData.name: imageData
Classes/SBLTransaction.html#/imageData.abstract: Image of receipt to upload. Must be 2 MB or less.

Classes/SBLTransaction.html#/userSubmitt.name: userSubmittedData
Classes/SBLTransaction.html#/userSubmitt.abstract: Receipt date, category, merchant name, and currency code

Classes/SBLTransaction.html#/error.name: error
Classes/SBLTransaction.html#/error.abstract: Set to a failure reason when transaction status is failed, or to noError otherwise

Classes/SBLTransaction.html#/mustReplace.name: mustReplaceImage
Classes/SBLTransaction.html#/mustReplace.abstract: Indicates that provided image failed on server, and must be replaced (retrying the same image is not recommended)

Classes/SBLTransaction.html#/init(imageD.name: init(imageData:)
Classes/SBLTransaction.html#/init(imageD.abstract: Initializes transaction with receipt image. Sets type to .image.

Classes/SBLTransaction.html#/init(extern.name: init(externalAccountTransactionID:)
Classes/SBLTransaction.html#/init(extern.abstract: Initializes transaction with externalAccountTransactionID to be used for bank transaction linking. Sets type to .image.

Classes/SBLTransaction.html#/init(forNon.name: init(forNonReceiptEmail:)
Classes/SBLTransaction.html#/init(forNon.abstract: Init with SBNonReceiptEmail. Used for conversion to receipt

Transactions%20Linking%20Reference.html#.name: Transaction
Transactions%20Linking%20Reference.html#.abstract: SBLTransaction typealias to be used in Swift.

Classes/SBLTransaction.html.name: SBLTransaction
Classes/SBLTransaction.html.abstract: Provides a data model for an ongoing receipt uploading operation. In Swift, use Transaction typealias.

Classes/SBDataEvent.html.name: SBDataEvent
Classes/SBDataEvent.html.abstract: Interface defines methods to monitor currently processed transactions

Transactions%20Linking%20Reference.html#.name: SBDataEventReceiptBlock
Transactions%20Linking%20Reference.html#.abstract: Executable block to call on Receipt event.

Transactions%20Linking%20Reference.html#.name: SBDataEventTransactionBlock
Transactions%20Linking%20Reference.html#.abstract: Executable block to call on Transaction event.

Protocols/TransactionObserver.html.name: TransactionObserver
Protocols/TransactionObserver.html.abstract: Protocol defines methods to monitor receipt uploading transaction progress

Protocols/SensibillUICoordinatorDelegate.name: coordinator(_:willPresent:)
Protocols/SensibillUICoordinatorDelegate.abstract: Informs the app that the start function will present the WebUINavigationController, and gives them a reference to it.

Protocols/SensibillUICoordinatorDelegate.abstract: Informs the app that the start function has completed presenting the WebUINavigationController, and gives them a reference to it.

Protocols/SensibillUICoordinatorDelegate.name: coordinatorWillPresentCapture(_:)
Protocols/SensibillUICoordinatorDelegate.abstract: Informs the integrated app that the coordinator is starting the capture flow.

Protocols/SensibillUICoordinatorDelegate.name: coordinatorShouldShowFatalErrorView(_:)

Protocols/SensibillUICoordinatorDelegate.name: coordinator(_:encountered:)
Protocols/SensibillUICoordinatorDelegate.abstract: Informs the app that there was an error starting the UI flow

Protocols/SensibillUICoordinatorDelegate.abstract: Informs the app that WebUI will be restarted

Protocols/SensibillUICoordinatorDelegate.name: coordinatorWillTerminateWebUI(_:)
Protocols/SensibillUICoordinatorDelegate.abstract: Informs the app that WebUI must be terminated

Classes/SensibillUICoordinator/Presentat.name: modal

Classes/SensibillUICoordinator/Presentat.name: embed

Classes/SensibillUICoordinator/Presentat.name: push
Classes/SensibillUICoordinator/Presentat.abstract: Will push Sensibill’s UI into the provided UINavigationController host. Will present modally if the host is not a UINavigationController.

Classes/SensibillUICoordinator.html#/ini.name: init(host:)
Classes/SensibillUICoordinator.html#/ini.abstract: Initialize with a host to present modally over

Classes/SensibillUICoordinator.html#/ini.name: init(host:presentationMethod:)
Classes/SensibillUICoordinator.html#/ini.abstract: Initialize with a host to present in the specified manner

Classes/SensibillUICoordinator.html#/sto.name: stop()
Classes/SensibillUICoordinator.html#/sto.abstract: Stops the WebUI process and cleans up. Informs the client that they should dismiss the view

Classes/SensibillUICoordinator.html.name: SensibillUICoordinator
Classes/SensibillUICoordinator.html.abstract: Object used to provide an easy interface for clients to display Sensibill’s UI. This class handles all internal state and movement between screens internally to Sensibill UI.

Protocols/SensibillUICoordinatorDelegate.name: SensibillUICoordinatorDelegate
Protocols/SensibillUICoordinatorDelegate.abstract: A conforming class would receive one or more events triggered by SensibillUICoordinator

Protocols/CaptureFlowCoordinatorDelegate.abstract: Informs that user that the capture flow is about to be shown and started.

Classes/SBSDKConfiguration.html#/c:objc(.name: navigationTopColor

Classes/SBSDKConfiguration.html#/c:objc(.abstract: Defines the colors used in Sensibill SDK

Classes/SBSDKConfiguration.html#/c:objc(.name: -applyColors
Classes/SBSDKConfiguration.html#/c:objc(.abstract: Applies colors provided via SBSDKColors to various configuration associated to SBSDKConfiguration

Classes/SBSDKConfiguration.html#/c:objc(.name: -prettyPrint
Classes/SBSDKConfiguration.html#/c:objc(.abstract: Attempts to print configuration in pretty json format onto debug console.

Classes/SBSDKConfiguration.html#/c:objc(.name: +localizedStringForKey:
Classes/SBSDKConfiguration.html#/c:objc(.abstract: Attempts to provide localized string for given key. If SBSDKConfiguration.externalBundle is defined then search would be made first in strings provided in external bundle otherwise search would be made in SDK provided localized strings table.

Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.name: brandBackground
Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.abstract: Represents the main brand color to be applied to UI elements.

Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.name: brandForeground
Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.abstract: Represents the color to be applied to elements on top of elements with brandBackground color (ie, text, icon tint).

Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.name: brandForegroundDisabled
Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.abstract: Represents the color to be applied to elements on top of elements with brandBackground color that are in a disabled state.

Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.name: actionBackground
Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.abstract: Represents the color to be applied to the background of UI elements (ie, button) that users will interact with to trigger an primary action.

Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.name: actionForeground
Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.abstract: Represents the color to be applied to elements on top of elements with actionBackground color (ie, text, icon tint).

Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.name: accentBackground
Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.abstract: Represents the color to be applied to the background of UI elements with additional user significance.

Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.name: accentForeground
Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.abstract: Represents the color to be applied to elements on top of elements with accentBackground color (ie, text, icon tint).

Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.name: alternateBackground
Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.abstract: Represents the alternate color to be elements with brand significance.

Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.name: alternateForeground
Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.abstract: Represents the color to be applied to elements on top of elements with alternateBackground color (ie, text, icon tint).

Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.name: errorBackground
Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.abstract: Represents the color to be applied to the background of UI elements that display errors.

Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.name: errorForeground
Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.abstract: Represents the color to be applied to elements on top of elements with errorBackground color (ie, text, icon tint).

Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.name: disabledBackground
Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.abstract: Represents the color to be applied to the background of UI elements that are in an error state.

Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.name: disabledForeground
Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.abstract: Represents the color to be applied to elements on top of elements with disabledBackground color (ie, text, icon tint).

Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.name: primaryForeground
Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.abstract: Represents the main color to be applied to elements on top of ui elements with primaryBackground/offPrimaryBackground color (ie, text, icon tint).

Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.name: primaryForeground2
Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.abstract: Represents the action color to be applied to elements on top of ui elements with primaryBackground/offPrimaryBackground color (ie, text, icon tint).

Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.name: primaryForeground3
Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.abstract: Represents the disabled color to be applied to elements on top of ui elements with primaryBackground/offPrimaryBackground color (ie, text, icon tint).

Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.name: primaryForeground4
Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.abstract: Represents the error color to be applied to elements on top of ui elements with primaryBackground/offPrimaryBackground color (ie, text, icon tint).

Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.name: primaryForeground5
Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.abstract: Represents the tint color for expense type image and label, notes image, and email caption label.

Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.name: primaryBackground
Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.abstract: Represents the primary color to be applied to background of screens.

Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.name: offPrimaryBackground
Classes/SBSDKColors.html#/c:objc(cs)SBSD.abstract: Represents the color to be applied to background of UI elements over top of primaryBackground (ie, background of cards).

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: cameraCaptureDefaultAuto
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: A Boolean value that represents the default mode capture will be in on launch. True will launch auto-capture by default, False will launch manual capture by default

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: enableLongReceiptCapture
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: Allows to enable or disable long receipts via image stitching. Default: False/No

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: attachLocationData
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: Allows to attach location information to a captured receipt. Default: False/No

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: isCropEnabled
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: Allows to enable or disable capture cropping. Default: True/Yes

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: enableBlurDetection
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: Allows to enable a blur warning on the capture preview screen after capturing. (applicable for iPhone 6s and newer) Default: True/Yes

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: enableFlash
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: Allows to enable the ability to toggle the phone’s flash on/off to help capture in low-light situations. Default: True/Yes

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: enableFeedbackToast
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: Allows to enable feedback toast on the capture screen. Default: True/Yes

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: enableImageGallery
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: Allows to enable the user to select an image from phone’s image gallery. Default: True/Yes

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: enableAutoCapture
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: Allows to enable the auto-capture feature. Default: True/Yes

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: captureBackgroundColor
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: The color that will be applied to background of capture screen. Defaults to SBSDKColors.primaryForeground

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: detectionStrokeColor
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: The color to be applied to the auto-capture detection outline color. Defaults to UIColor clear

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: detectionFillColor
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: The color to be applied to the auto-capture detection box fill color

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: captureCircleStrokeColor
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: The stroke color of the processing circle edge which appears when a document is detected in auto-capture. Defaults to SBSDKColors.brandForeground

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: captureCircleFillColor
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: The fill color of the processing circle which appears when a document is detected in auto-capture. Defaults to UIColor clearColor

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: captureIconButtonTextColor
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: The text color of the buttons that contain an icon (crop, add page, and retake).. Defaults to SBSDKColors.alternateForeground

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: capturePreviewTitleColor
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: The text color of the title on the Capture Preview screen. Defaults to SBSDKColors.alternateForeground

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: capturePermissionMessageColor
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: The text color of the message that appears if a user denies system capture permissions. Defaults to SBSDKColors.alternateForeground

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: capturePermissionButtonBackgroundColor
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: The background color of the button that appears when the user denies system capture permissions. Defaults to SBSDKColors.actionBackground

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: capturePermissionButtonTextColor
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: The text color of the button that appears when the user denies system capture permissions. Defaults to SBSDKColors.actionForeground

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: captureDocumentTypeButtonTextColor
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: The text color of the unselected capture type button (Normal/Long) Defaults to SBSDKColors.alternateForeground

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: capturePreviewDoneButtonBackgroundColor
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: The background color of the done button on the capture preview screen. Defaults to SBSDKColors.actionBackground

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: capturePreviewDoneButtonTextColor
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: The text color of the done button on the capture preview screen. Defaults to SBSDKColors.actionForeground

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: autoCaptureButtonTextColor
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: The text color of the auto-capture button when auto-capture is enabled. Defaults to SBSDKColors.alternateForeground

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: autoCaptureDisabledButtonTextColor
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: The text color of the auto-capture button when auto-capture is disabled. Defaults to SBSDKColors.disabledBackground

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: cropCancelButtonBackgroundColor
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: The background color of the cancel button on the crop screen. Defaults to SBSDKColors.alternateBackground

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: cropCancelButtonTextColor
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: The text color of the cancel button on the crop screen. Defaults to SBSDKColors.alternateForeground

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: cropDoneButtonBackgroundColor
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: The color to be applied to Done button’s background visible on image crop screen. Defaults to SBSDKColors.actionBackground

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: cropDoneButtonTextColor
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: The background color of the done button on the crop screen. Defaults to SBSDKColors.actionForeground

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: cropLoaderColor
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: The tint color of the UIActivityIndicatorView that appears while the crop screen is loading. Defaults to SBSDKColors.alternateForeground

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: toastBackgroundColor
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: The background color of the feedback toast that appears while capturing. Defaults to SBSDKColors.alternateBackground with 0.45 alpha.

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: toastTitleColor
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: The title color of the feedback toast that appears while capturing. Defaults to SBSDKColors.alternateForeground

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: detectionlineWidth
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: The width of the detection outline. Default: 0.0

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: capturePermissionButtonCornerRadius
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: The corner radius of the capture permission button that appears when the user denies system capture permissions. Default: 24.0

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: autoCaptureButtonCornerRadius
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: The corner radius of the auto-capture toggle button. Default: 0.0

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: captureCircleLineWidth
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: The width of the border of the circle that appears when an auto-capture is processing. Default: 2.0

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: cropCancelButtonCornerRadius
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: The corner radius of the cancel button on the crop screen. Default: 0.0

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: cropDoneButtonCornerRadius
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: The corner radius of the done button on the crop screen. Default: 24.0

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: cropCornerPointDiameter
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: The diameter of the corner points that are used to crop. Default: 30.0

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: cropEdgeTouchThreshold
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: The distance away from a crop edge’s bar a user’s touch can be that will still grab the edge. Default: 50.0

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: capturePreviewDoneButtonCornerRadius
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: The corner radius of the done button on the capture preview screen. Default: 24.0

Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.name: toastCornerRadius
Classes/SBCaptureViewConfiguration.html#.abstract: The corner radius of the feedback toast that appears while capturing. Default: 24.0

Classes/SBSDKColors.html.name: SBSDKColors
Classes/SBSDKColors.html.abstract: Interface to define the Sensibill branding colors.

Classes/SBSDKConfiguration.html.name: SBSDKConfiguration
Classes/SBSDKConfiguration.html.abstract: Interface that defines the complete set of SDK configurations.

Classes/SBSDKFontSet.html.name: SBSDKFontSet
Classes/SBSDKFontSet.html.abstract: Interface that defines the fonts used in Sensibill SDK.

Classes/Sensibill.html#/locale.name: locale
Classes/Sensibill.html#/locale.abstract: Locale. Our API only supports a set of locales.

Classes/Sensibill.html#/start(tokenProvi.name: start(tokenProvider:cacheIdentifier:completion:)
Classes/Sensibill.html#/start(tokenProvi.abstract: Request to start SDK. Note that this is an asynchronous operation. Caller must wait for start callback to return and succeed before attempting any further interaction with SDK.

Classes/Sensibill.html#/stop(completion:.name: stop(completion:)
Classes/Sensibill.html#/stop(completion:.abstract: Requests to stop the SDK and invalidates user token.

Classes/Sensibill.html#/stop(invalidateT.name: stop(invalidateToken:completion:)
Classes/Sensibill.html#/stop(invalidateT.abstract: Requests to stop the SDK. Allows to specify if user token must be invalidated.

Classes/Sensibill.html#/updateToken(comp.name: updateToken(completion:)
Classes/Sensibill.html#/updateToken(comp.abstract: Refreshes token by calling a tokenProvider, and registers new credentials

Classes/Sensibill.html.name: Sensibill
Classes/Sensibill.html.abstract: Main class used to configure the Sensibill Environment

Protocols/TokenProvider.html#/provideTok.name: provideTokenReplacement(completion:)
Protocols/TokenProvider.html#/provideTok.abstract: Method called when the Sensibill SDK needs an access token.

Classes/PasswordAuthenticator.html#/logi.name: login(accessId:password:completion:)
Classes/PasswordAuthenticator.html#/logi.abstract: Tries to authenticate a user with an access id and password

Classes/PasswordAuthenticator.html#/chec.name: checkStrength(password:checkType:completion:)
Classes/PasswordAuthenticator.html#/chec.abstract: Verifies the strength of a given password

Classes/PasswordAuthenticator.html#/rese.name: resetPassword(accessId:temporaryPassword:newPassword:completion:)
Classes/PasswordAuthenticator.html#/rese.abstract: Resets the users password given a temporary password

Classes/PasswordAuthenticator.html#/chec.name: checkExistence(accessId:completion:)
Classes/PasswordAuthenticator.html#/chec.abstract: Verifies if a given access id already exists

Classes/PasswordAuthenticator.html#/chec.name: checkExistence(receiptEmail:completion:)
Classes/PasswordAuthenticator.html#/chec.abstract: Verifies if a given receipt email already exists

Classes/PasswordAuthenticator.html.name: PasswordAuthenticator
Classes/PasswordAuthenticator.html.abstract: Handles all authentication flows for the Password Authenticated users

Protocols/TokenProvider.html.name: TokenProvider
Protocols/TokenProvider.html.abstract: This class is responsible for providing new tokens if the current tokens were to expire.

Classes/Credentials.html.name: Credentials
Classes/Credentials.html.abstract: Structure that holds all necessary credential information for a user
